Reverse image search: Alt News performed a reverse image search on the viral image and found an identical image on a lifestyle website, indicating that the viral image was manipulated.
Comparison with original image: The comparison between the viral image and the original image published on Fashion Lady showed that Kamala Harris's face had been morphed into the original image, further confirming the manipulation.
Source verification: The claim made by BJP MP Satya Pal Singh was found to be false, as the image was not from a Ganesh temple in Chennai but was a morphed version of an image found on a lifestyle website.
Background information: The expert's verdict mentions that Kamala Harris has African-American and South Asian-American heritage, and her maternal family has roots in Chennai. This information supports the conclusion that the claim of the image being from a Ganesh temple in Chennai is false.
